details.title: Erland's plugins Modified By Schmurtz : Line-In control

applet.name: SqueezePlayAdmin
applet.title: SqueezePlay Admin + Line-In control *Beta*
applet.desc: *** THIS IS A BETA VERSION ***. Make it possible to remotely access preferences and files on a Radio, Touch or Controller + allow to activate Line-in remotely
applet.creator: Erland Isaksson, Schmurtz

plugin.name: SqueezePlayAdminClient
plugin.title: SqueezePlay Admin Client + Line-In control *Beta*
plugin.desc: *** BETA VERSION ***. Makes it possible to remotely access files and preferences on a Touch, Radio or Controller. The SqueezePlay Admin applet has to be installed on the device you like to browse/view files and preferences on. (Controller, Radio, Touch).Line-In can be activated remotely.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson, Schmurtz
